title: Losing faith in LoL
body:
When will riot do something about the trolls? 2 games in a row i have lost because of someone that started a game ran down mid gave yasuo 1st blood then left the game, and 2nd game we had a vayne jungler that wouldnt help in team fights, wouldnt communicate, when we ask for help with a gank or an objective she would reply with "omfg silver trash always needs help, im just going to farm." like its a team right? and OCE is bad with the whole "team" thing, there are some good games that i have, even games i have lost i have still enjoyed because it was a good game! its just sad that this problem still around since day one.
i got demoted from s2 to s3 after being on 0LP after 1 game.
come on riot what the actual fuck.

iam not sure how they can monitor player behavior better but im sure riot has enough brains to think of something.

replies.body: i would like to agree with king on the same point but also that it is mostly in solo q this happens weather your in a duo or not people still find a way to fuck with you even coz your in a duo or they have had a shit day

Riot have chalked this up to "There is nothing wrong with this behaviour. Flaming, afking and trolling isn't a real issue"
~Citation; Ticket #45182791, Ticket #42702812, and Ticket #40509743.

I'm not messing with you dude, this is what it's chalked up to EVERY time I bring it up.
